DOC.HEADLINE: NEWSWIRE : TENNIS
DOC.TEXT: Top-seeded Pete Sampras , the defending champion , rallied from a mid-match slump to defeat Jason Stoltenberg of Australia , 6-1 , 4-6 , 7-5 , and move_into the quarterfinals of the New South Wales Open at Sydney , Australia . Aaron Krickstein upset seventh-seeded Marc Rosset of Switzerland , 6-3 , 7-5 , in a second-round match and was one of five Americans to reach the quarterfinals . Also advancing were sixth-seeded Todd Martin and unseeded Ivan Lendl and Richey Reneberg . Miscellany Franz Heinzer of Switzerland , the downhill World Cup champion , crashed in practice at Kitzbuhel , Austria , and suffered a concussion and bruises , injuries that might keep him out of Saturday ' s World Cup race .
